title: HUD Skin okay?
body: I have this HUD and loading screen skin that features project ashe. But I have bought project ashe myself. The actual champion skin and these two things are not even related. My question is, is this considered as breaking the league of legends code? Because Im not scripting or adding anything that gives me an advantage in my plays. Its just a customized HUD and loading screen. Ive been told that it was okay before, but if I could get a riot confirmation that would be great. Cuz im getting reported a lot for scripting..and im not...

replies.body:
Hmmm....those reports for scripting might be prompted by your name.....hmmmm.....just a wild guess.


As for the game alterations, it might not be giving you any kind of direct advantage, but it does also alter the game. Keep that in mind while reading over the official [**Third Party Applications FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848).
I changed to that name because a keep getting a lot of accusation of my scripting both from enemy team AND my team. But I will read this article, thank you~
